subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Ten years after their first Grand Slam title, also at Roland Garros, the twins Bob and Mike Bryan added to their record by defeating Michaël Llodra and Nicolas Mahut.
snippet: Ten years after their first Grand Slam title, also at Roland Garros, the twins Bob and Mike Bryan added to their record by defeating Michaël Llodra and Nicolas Mahut.
